thread.title: Here's Zendaya Embodying #HairGoals, All of the Hair Goals
thread.title_full: Here's Zendaya Embodying #HairGoals, All of the Hair Goals

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Here's Zendaya Embodying #HairGoals, All of the Hair Goals
text:
Share Tweet Pin E-mail Courtesy of Mane Addicts Zendaya features in an awesome new photo shoot for Mane Addicts, as part of the site's "Mane Muse" series . I love that pun almost as I love these photos. ​Inspired by a series of hair icons from decades past, Zendaya poses styled with hippie-chic '60s Cher hair (yay Cher!), and then as Diana Ross and Grace Jones among others — pictured below is the Grace Jones look, which Zendaya says is her favorite even though really all of them are flawless:
Share Tweet Pin E-mail Courtesy of Mane Addicts Click through to Mane Addicts for more photos ; having clearly mastered every 'do out there, Zendaya says her next set of hairstyles will involve playing with color. Clear some room on your Pinterest hairspiration board, because that sounds like fun.
Follow Alex on Twitter . ​
